announcements.title: Penal Code: Addition of 1518 and removal of 1508
announcements.content: The Penal Code has been updated to clarify the regulations regarding intersections, permanently getting rid of the traffic lights. The right-of-way has now officially been codified as yielding to the vehicle on the right. Review the specifics of the penal code for more information.

announcements.title: New Release: 3.1.0
